item.title: CVE-2024-30495|2024-03-29T13:56:28.552Z -- Faboba -- Falang multilanguage
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Faboba Falang multilanguage.This issue affects Falang multilanguage: from n/a through 1.3.47.
